Where is the documentation issue?
-->

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|

| **Section** | <!-- e.g., "Installation", "Quick Start" --> |
| **URL** | <!-- If online, paste the link --> |

## [SEARCH] Issue Type

<!--
Check one:
-->

- [ ] **Incorrect** — The documentation says X, but the code does Y
- [ ] **Unclear** — I don't understand what this means
- [ ] **Missing** — There's no documentation for this feature
- [ ] **Outdated** — This was true for an older version but not anymore
- [ ] **Typo/Grammar** — Minor text issues
